item.title: courses
item.description: The Bloomberg Center enrolled I spend most of my time on research – here are a few courses I took along the way in grad school: CS 5785: Applied Machine Learning, with Prof. Serge Belongie CS 6431: Security and Privacy Technologies, with Prof. Vitaly Shmatikov and Prof. Tom Ristenpart CS 6110: Advanced Programming Languages, with Prof. Adrian Sampson CS 6820: Analysis of Algorithms, with Prof.
